dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Blood-tinged Scissorblades​</line-height>

- Used for special skills

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Blood-tinged Scissorblades II​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 20
- Stage 2 Blood-tinged Scissorblades
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down for every 5 Stack
- Used for certain Skills

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Blood-tinged Scissorblades III​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 30
- Stage 3 Blood-tinged Scissorblades
- Turn Start: gain 2 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down for every 5 Stack
- Used for certain Skills

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Bloodfeast​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 999
- Stores all Bleed damage dealt in this zone
- Resets when moving to a different zone
- This value is shared by all characters
- If there is a higher Kindred among the allies who also consumes Bloodfeast, this unit cannot consume Bloodfeast until that ally consumes it first.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Bloodfeast Consumed​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 999
- Displays the total amount of Bloodfeast consumed in this Encounter

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Hunger​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
Turn Start: Gain 1 Bind and 2 Attack Power Up.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Hunger​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Panic
Turn Start: Gain 2 Bind and 4 Attack Power Up.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Declared Duel - Camille​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. 
- Replaced when another unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Foolhardy Duel​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn for every 10% of the missing HP. (max 5)
Turn End: gain 1 Bind next turn for every 10% of the missing HP. (max 5)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Focused Attack​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
When using a Skill against the same Slot this unit successfully hit last turn, gain the following effects based on the number of consecutive turns it successfully hit the Slot
- 1 Consecutive hit: Clash Power +1
- 2 Consecutive hits: Base Power +1
- 3 Consecutive hits: Base Power +1, Coin Power +1

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>The Weak​</line-height>
dataList.desc: - Damage Dealt -10%

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>An Actual Bear​</line-height>
dataList.desc: - It eats people. How fearsome!

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Blood-shooting!!​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
On Death:
- Bloodfeast +30
- gain 2 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource
- Next turn: all allies gain 0.1 to all Phys. Resistances. This effect can stack. (max 5)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>HOW RIGHTEOUS!!​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- At every Turn End: gain 1 Haste, 3 Offense Level Up, and 3 Defense Level Down next turn
- Gain 2 additional Offense Level Up after every 3 cumulative turns (max 6)
- On Clash Win, heal 3 SP
- On Kill, gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Declared Duel - Meursault​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. 
- Replaced when another unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Focused Attack - Meursault​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
<Focused Encounters Only>
The unit that inflicted this Focused Attack gains the following effects based on the target Slot's Focused Attack Stack.
  · 1x Stack: Gain Clash Power +1
  · 2x Stack: Gain Base Power +1
  · 3x Stack: Gain Base Power +1 and Coin Power +1
- Expires if, for a turn, the unit that inflicted it fails to hit the Slot inflicted with their Focused Attack.
- Expires if the unit that inflicted Focused Attack inflicts it on a different Slot.
- Replaced if a different unit inflicts Focused Attack on a Slot already inflicted with Focused Attack.
- At the start of the next turn, if a Slot inflicted with Focused Attack is no longer present, rearrange all Focused Attacks inflicted against the Slots of that Part in the order of Deployment

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>I will take responsibility, through my bloody tears.​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Gain 1 additional Hardblood every time this unit gains Hardblood. (5 times per turn)
- At every Turn End: gain 2 Haste and 3 Offense Level Up next turn
- Gain 2 additional Offense Level Up after every 3 cumulative turns (max 6)
- On Clash Win, heal 3 SP
- On Kill, gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>In which is recounted the thralldom to blood thicker than water.​</line-height>

- Gain 2 additional Hardblood every time this unit gains Hardblood. (5 times per turn)
- At every Turn End: gain 2 Haste and 3 Offense Level Up next turn
- Gain 2 additional Offense Level Up after every 3 cumulative turns (max 6)
- On Clash Win, heal 3 SP

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Which treats the banquet of blood for the Family's suffering.​</line-height>
dataList.desc:

Deal +10% more damage

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Of how a certain Bloodfiend came to bear the guilt of patricide alone.​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Clash Power +4 for every value
- Apply Shield to self and all allies at Combat Start
- Deal +20% more damage
- On Hit, deal 1 fixed damage as well
